entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is looking forward to the Potions exam.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and classmate who seems determined to be in a bad mood.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate who is studying for the Potions exam with him.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who Hermione seems to dislike.

relationships.description: Hermione's bad mood persists for most of the weekend.
Harry and Ron spend most of Saturday and Sunday studying for Potions together.
Harry is concerned that Umbridge will wait for proof before taking action.
